OrgName: Arvato Digital Services LLC and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries Arvato Entertainment LLC and Arvato Services LLC
activities:
As a Service Provider: Arvato Digital Services LLC (the “Company”)

• Provides e-commerce capabilities and integrates customer service, IT, logistics, and financial services on behalf of its clients.  In connection therewith, Arvato receives personal information from its clients’ customers to, among other things, fulfill and confirm orders, provide technical and customer support service, customize shopping experiences and help its clients administer customer loyalty programs.

To the extent that the Company is subject to any EU privacy regime in connection with the services it provides to its clients, it is in its capacity as a data processor. 

As an Employer: The Company or its affiliates in the EEA and Switzerland may transfer personal information concerning current, former, and prospective personnel in the EEA and Switzerland to the U.S. in connection with the management and operation of the company, human resources administration, and safety and security processes. 

• Personal information may also be processed and transferred to the United States in connection with collection and discovery requests in the context of litigation or government investigations, and in such context it may be made available to adverse parties in litigation or governmental entities.
